org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.plugin.configuration

Class Requirements.RequirementsAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codeoverflow.chatoverflow.api.plugin.configuration.Requirements.RequirementsAccessor
  • Enclosing class:
    Requirements

    public class Requirements.RequirementsAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This accessor is used to get write access to encapsulated requirements.

    • Method Detail

      • getRequirementById

        public java.util.Optional<? extends Requirement<? extends Serializable>> getRequirementById(java.lang.String uniqueRequirementId)
        Returns a requirement of any type (input / output / parameter) with the given unique id.
        Parameters:
        uniqueRequirementId - the plugin unique requirement id
        Returns:
        an optional encapsulating the requirement or none

      • unsetRequirementById

        public boolean unsetRequirementById(java.lang.String uniqueRequirementId)
        Unsets the value of a requirement specified by the unique id.
        Parameters:
        uniqueRequirementId - the plugin unique requirement id
        Returns:
        true, if the requirement exists and previously had a value

      • isComplete

        public java.lang.Boolean isComplete()
        Tests, if all non-optional requirements had been set (e.g. by the framework)
        Returns:
        true, if all needed requirements had been set

      • getMissingRequirements

        public java.util.List<Requirement<? extends Serializable>> getMissingRequirements()
        Returns a list of all optional and non-optional requirements which are not set.
        Returns:
        a list of unique requirement ids

      • setRequirementContent

        public void setRequirementContent(java.lang.String uniqueRequirementId,
                                  Serializable content)
        Sets a requirements content if the specified requirement exists.
        Parameters:
        uniqueRequirementId - the unique id of a requirement which must be created first
        content - the serialized content to set
